name: Karthus
title: the Deathsinger
lore:
''Death is not the end of the journey, it is just the beginning...''

The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of life and death. When Karthus emerges from the Shadow Isles, it is to bring the joy of death to mortals as an apostle of the unliving.

allytips_0: Ask your allies to help point out when you should use Requiem to get kills in different lanes.
allytips_1: Lay Waste is very strong at farming minions and harassing enemy champions.
enemytips_0: Karthus can cast spells for a short duration after he is killed. Move away from his corpse to be safe.
enemytips_1: Make sure you always have enough health to survive Requiem, even if you have to go back to the base more frequently to heal.
